channel.title: Debugging on Qiu's Quibble
channel.description: Recent content in Debugging on Qiu's Quibble

item.title: Enable Auto-complete in a PDB session
item.description: EDIT: 2012-06-19 There are so many other much better options now that renders recipe obsolete. See pdb++ or ipdb Pretty simple actuallyâ€¦Just put the following code in ~/.pdbrc and then you can use the Tab key during a PDB session to see the available attributes of the current context. import rlcompleter pdb.Pdb.complete=rlcompleter.Completer(locals()).complete
